WorkItem.Description:
When I attempt to open and view the relative benefit of each elixir and flask, Rawr throws an error:
 
== Version: 4.3.6.0 SL ==
 
== Error Message ==
[Arg_NullReferenceException]
Arguments: 
Debugging resource strings are unavailable. Often the key and arguments provide sufficient information to diagnose the problem. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=106663&Version=4.0.60831.0&File=mscorlib.dll&Key=Arg_NullReferenceException
 
== StackTrace ==
   at Rawr.Mage.CalculationsMage.IsBuffRelevant(Buff buff, Character character)
   at Rawr.CalculationsBase.GetBuffCalculations(Character character, CharacterCalculationsBase currentCalcs, String filter)
   at Rawr.UI.GraphDisplay.UpdateGraphBuffs(String subgraph)
   at Rawr.UI.GraphDisplay.UpdateGraph()
   at Rawr.UI.ChartPicker.SetCurrentGraph()
   at Rawr.UI.ChartPicker.Grid_MouseLeftButtonUp(Object sender, MouseButtonEventArgs e)

== These are the Steps that I have tried ==
Open "Buffs->Elixirs and Flasks" in right pane.
There is no suggested fix, so I'm posting here to see if it is something that can be fixed in the code.
WorkItem.Summary: Mage throws error when looking at Elixir and Flask buffs
